name: Autumn Queen
description: "The husk harvest is at hand!" - Autumn Queen

heroPerk.name: Force of Nature
heroPerk.description: An additional <HeroAbility>Shockwave</> activates from your tamed pet when used.

commanderPerk.name: Force of Nature +
commanderPerk.description: An additional <HeroAbility>Shockwave</> activates from your tamed pet when used. Your pet enters Frenzy for <Number>[Ability.Line1]</> seconds for each enemy damaged by its Shockwave, causing it to move and attack <Number>[Ability.Line2]%</> faster.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Slam a grenade into the ground, knocking back and dealing [Damage.Value] energy damage to nearby enemies.

abilities.name: War Cry
abilities.description: Shout an inspiring War Cry, granting nearby allies +[Damage] weapon damage, +[Ability.Line5] fire rate, and +[Ability.Line4] melee attack speed for [Duration] seconds.

abilities.name: Goin' Commando!!!
abilities.description: Equip a minigun which deals [AbilityWeaponDamage.Value] physical damage per shot and fires [FireRate.Value] shots per second. Lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.

recruitment.sourceText: Earned by completing Hero Quests in the Autumn Foothills unlocked after "Plankerton Defense 1"
